title: StarCraft 2: NEW PATCH - Late Game ZvP Is Actually Fun?! (Trap vs DRG)
excerpt: Awesome game of professional StarCraft 2 between Trap and DRG. In this Zerg versus Protoss we see what the late game of this matchup looks like so far after the balance changes.
